titles.title: Firearms by Foreign Convicts Clarification Act of 2007
A bill to establish and clarify that Congress does not authorize persons convicted of dangerous crimes in foreign courts to freely possess firearms in the United States.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5658-5659)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
5/7/2007--Introduced.
Firearms by Foreign Convicts Clarification Act of 2007 - Amends the federal criminal code to prevent any individual convicted of a felony or crime of domestic violence in a foreign court from possessing a firearm in the United States.
